item.title: Heartbreaking Final Farewell: Ray and Martha's Funeral Home Holds Last Service in Carnegie, OK
item.description: Introduction On a sunny Saturday in Carnegie, OK, the town came together to bid a heartbreaking final farewell to Ray and Martha’s Funeral Home After nearly a century of providing comfort and care to families in the area, the funeral home held its last service Background of Ray and Martha’s Funeral Home Ray and Martha’s Funeral Home was founded in 123 by Ray and Martha Smith. The Smiths had a passion for providing compassionate care to those in their community during their time of need.
